title: Digital Forensics
summary: Disk imaging, memory forensics, file system analysis, and forensic toolkits. Master digital forensics techniques for investigating cyber incidents.  Learn about disk imaging and preservation, memory forensics, file system analysis (NTFS, ext4, HFS+), forensic toolkits (Autopsy, Volatility, FTK), timeline analysis, and evidence collection. The lesson includes detailed explanations, visual aids, and assessment tools to ensure mastery of the concepts.
detailedSummary:
Disk imaging, memory forensics, file system analysis, and forensic toolkits. Master digital forensics techniques for investigating cyber incidents.  Learn about disk imaging and preservation, memory forensics, file system analysis (NTFS, ext4, HFS+), forensic toolkits (Autopsy, Volatility, FTK), timeline analysis, and evidence collection. The lesson includes detailed explanations, visual aids, and assessment tools to ensure mastery of the concepts.

This topic provides essential knowledge for understanding cybersecurity at the Advanced level. Through comprehensive study, students will develop a deep understanding of the concepts, principles, and applications related to Digital Forensics. The material is designed to build a strong foundation for further learning and practical application in real-world contexts.
